getCost() - Method in enum asgn2Pizzas.PizzaTopping

getCostPerPizza() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns the amount that an individual pizza costs to make.
getCustomer(String, String, String, int, int) - Static method in class asgn2Customers.CustomerFactory
A method that uses the Factory Method pattern to produce an instance of one of the asgn2Customers.Customer subclasses.
getCustomerByIndex(int) - Method in class asgn2Restaurant.PizzaRestaurant
Returns the Customer object contained at the specified index of the customers field.
getCustomerType() - Method in class asgn2Customers.Customer
Returns a human understandable description of the Customer's type.
getDeliveryDistance() - Method in class asgn2Customers.Customer
An abstract method that returns the distance between the Customer and the restaurant depending on the mode of delivery.
getDeliveryDistance() - Method in class asgn2Customers.DriverDeliveryCustomer
Returns the Manhattan Distance between the instance of DriverDeliveryCustomer and the restaurant.
getDeliveryDistance() - Method in class asgn2Customers.DroneDeliveryCustomer
Returns the Euclidean Distance between the instance of DroneDeliveryCustomer and the restaurant.
getDeliveryDistance() - Method in class asgn2Customers.PickUpCustomer
Overrides DeliveryDistance() in Customer.
getLocationX() - Method in class asgn2Customers.Customer
Returns the Customer's X location which is the number of blocks East or West that the Customer is located relative to the Pizza Palace restaurant.
getLocationY() - Method in class asgn2Customers.Customer
Returns the Customer's Y location which is the number of blocks North or South that the Customer is located relative to the Pizza Palace restaurant.
getMobileNumber() - Method in class asgn2Customers.Customer
Returns the Customer's mobile number.
getName() - Method in class asgn2Customers.Customer
Returns the Customer's name.
getNumCustomerOrders() - Method in class asgn2Restaurant.PizzaRestaurant
Returns the number of objects contained in the customers field.
getNumPizzaOrders() - Method in class asgn2Restaurant.PizzaRestaurant
Returns the number of objects contained in the pizzas field.
getOrderCost() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns the amount that the entire order costs to make, taking into account the type and quantity of pizzas.
getOrderPrice() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns the amount that the entire order is sold to the customer, taking into account the type and quantity of pizzas.
getOrderProfit() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns the profit made by the restaurant on the order which is the order price minus the order cost.
getPizza(String, int, LocalTime, LocalTime) - Static method in class asgn2Pizzas.PizzaFactory
A method that uses the Factory Method pattern to produce an instance of one of the asgn2Pizzas.Pizza subclasses.
getPizzaByIndex(int) - Method in class asgn2Restaurant.PizzaRestaurant
Returns the Pizza object contained at the specified index of the pizzas field.
getPizzaType() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns a human understandable description of the Pizza's type.
getPricePerPizza() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns the amount that an individual pizza is sold to the customer.
getQuantity() - Method in class asgn2Pizzas.Pizza
Returns the quantity of pizzas ordered.
getTotalDeliveryDistance() - Method in class asgn2Restaurant.PizzaRestaurant
Returns the total delivery distance for all of the customers.
getTotalProfit() - Method in class asgn2Restaurant.PizzaRestaurant
Returns the total profit for all of the pizza orders.
